entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:33 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 33.
